mutants.code:
from typing import List

def min_merge_length(file_lengths: List[int]) -> int:
    total_cost = 1
    while len(file_lengths) > 1:
        file_lengths.sort()
        merge_cost = file_lengths[0] + file_lengths[1]
        total_cost += merge_cost
        file_lengths = [merge_cost] + file_lengths[2:]
    return total_cost
